channel.title: Omfg! look!
channel.description:
:eek: lol i got you to look hahaha nooblet!!!
Jk!! the real reason i need you to look at this is becuase i need help trying to do something...if i were to make it so you have to wear a certain armor to get into a place how would i do that? like if you had to have...a idk...whip to get into it how would i do that?

item.title: Omfg! look!
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Noes_PIERATS Oh Noes! PIERATS!
item.description:
@Oh_Noes_PIERATS wrote:

Something along the lines of this in pbulic boolean process:

if (playerEquipment[playerItem] != Id){ if (absX >= 1 && absY >= 1 && absX <=10 && absY <= 10){ teleportX = absX + 1; teleportY = absY + 1; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg! look!
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

Sliv, isn’t yours though if he wears the cape he get’s teleported?

He wants it so he has to wear the cape to be able to get in…like you need 30 gp to get to karmja…

am i right?

Read full topic

ill try that out in a min im busy now =P

item.title: Omfg! look!
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

[center]You would use the following.

if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == Identification) { TeleportToX = 0; TeleportToY = 0; } else { SendMessage("You can't go in here without the correct item."); }

Obviously the teleport would be the other side of the door.[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg! look!
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

if it was a commands maybe you could do this…

if(comand.equalsIgnoreCase("PLACE") { { if(wearID == 4151 ) { teleX = ; teleY = ; } } else { sendMessage("You need a whip to get in! } }

^May not work just a two second write down.
